official_title: To amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require States to check law enforcement records to verify whether adult applicants for food stamp benefits are ineligible to receive such benefits because they are detainees in law enforcement facilities or are fugitives from justice.
short_title: Food Stamp Criminal Backgound Check Requirement Act of 1998

summary.text: Food Stamp Criminal Background Check Requirement Act of 1998 - Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977, as amended by the Balanced Budget Act of 1997, to require States to check the criminal backgrounds of adult members of applicant households for purposes of food stamp program eligibility and verification.

titles.title: Food Stamp Criminal Backgound Check Requirement Act of 1998

To amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to require States to check law enforcement records to verify whether adult applicants for food stamp benefits are ineligible to receive such benefits because they are detainees in law enforcement facilities or are fugitives from justice.
